div.p:
Curia Capitalis balliuorum burgi
de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij die
mensis Januarij Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo
nonagesimo tercio

Eodem die Jacobus Kennarty senior deuenit plegius legalis quod mar
gareta fechat erit Indempnis pro eo Johanne lammyntone et parte sua quam
Impredire poterit aliter quam per viam iuris sub pena centum
mercarum prout in littera regia desuper directa preposito et ballivis
plenius continuetur Et dicta margareta inuenit Johannem colison'
plegium legales quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis pro se et patricio
ros' sponso aliter quam per viam Juris Et quelibet dictarum
parcium obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes
de huiusmodi fideiussione
Eodem die Andreas litstar in Amerciamento Curie quia non comparuit

Eodem die Ingeramus lidale in Amerciamento Curie quia non Intrauit
Alexandrum teile prout obligatus fuit

Eodem die Willelmus scrimgeour' in Amerciamento Curie quia non Intra
uit Johannem barkar prout obligatus fuit

The samyn day comperit mathow branche befor the aldirman
and balyeis ande producit In presence of Johnhe andirsone
ane assedacione vndir the Seile of Androv branche Andirson'
and the Sele of thomas fyf balye for the tyme of
ane wolt for tene yeris and ane merchand' butht for
nyntene yeris In formalyne berand' the date the xviij
day of September the yer' of god jM iiijC auchty and
Sevin yeris

Eodem die Johannes fechat in Amerciamento Curie per assisam pro perturbio
Andree nevisone Et vxor sua conuicta pro perturbio sponse
ipsius Andree

Eodem die thomas talyour' in Amerciamento Curie pro perturbio Willelmi
matland'

Eodem die Johannes Sanclar deuenit plegius legalis quod
Andreas nevisone erit Indempnis pro Johanne fechat aliter
quam per viam iuris Et Idem Johannes fechat obligatur ad conseruandum dictum
suum plegium Indempnem de huiusmodi fideiussione

The samyne day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thomas
mar' forspekar that Jonhne fechat at the key sal deliuer the hous'
to Androw nevison agane quhile Witsonday and he sal haue
half the maile fre for the strubulance done to him and his wyf

The samyn day Duncane ydile was conuikit for Regratinge
and In forstallinge of the tone

the saide day Jonhne blak become Souerte to the aldirman
and balyeis for thomas philp to do to the toune that he aw
of resone and to entir him tharto quhene he beis requirit

the saide day Androw tulibo become Souerte to the aldirman
and balyeis to Entir Androw Wilsone quhen he beis requirit
tharto to do to the tovne that he aw of resone

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane assis' thomas
mar' forspekar' that gif euire It happinnis Alexander teyle to
committ ony strubulance in tyme to Cum within the tovne or
fredome of it and beis conuikit tharof he sal pay be common
for stribulance for his demeritis bigane

The saide day the Androu Culane eldar callit lauchfully
and nocht comperit to ansuer to the borghe strekit one him be
Androu murray eldar for the wranguis' haldin fra him of
aucht merkis of his girssome and quharfor the balyeis chargit
Androw nachty sergeand' officiar' to pas' and tak ane streis'
of the said Androu and latt it to borghe' and it be askit and
warne him to this day xv dais to cum and ansuer' to the said'
borghe as the secund' day of process'

Eodem die accedens ad barram magister Alexander byssat capellanus altaris Sancti
Sanguinis in ecclesia beati nicholaij et protestatus fuit in forma iuris pro vno
annuo Redditu xiij s' et iiijor d' sibi annuatim debit' et dicto altari et
a longo tempore non solut' de quadam terra vasta Jacente
in vico castri Inter terram Willelmi scrimgeour' ex boreali et communionem
portam prope montem castri ex australi Ad quam terramThis entry continues on page 487 (ARO-7-0487-01).

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure Alexandri Rede Anno Domini
et cetera nonagesimo tercio

Andreas Jonhnesone in fingask recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
et conceditur comodum inde domino Andree coupar prestito Solito Juramento

Willelmus corne in Stradone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento et Solut' xx s'

Robertus Walcar' in Skulhile recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito
Juramento pro toga data Henrico Cantori in choro

Richardus baxtar recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito
Juramento et Solut' xiij s' et iiij d'

Johannes Robertsone Junior in taruas recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito
Solito Juramento et Solut'

Robertus moir' ad Instanciam Abbatis de Arbrothoc recipitur in liberum burgensem et
fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et Soluet dimidium marce ad fabricam ecclesie infra annum

Patricius chernside recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
Solito Juramento ad Instanciam domini Episcopi Abirdonensis

Dominus Willelmus sachlie recipitur gracia prepositi in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde Solut' v s' in alba bursa prestito Juramento

Alexander malison' nepos prepositi recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solut' Juramento

Walterus Waus Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito Juramento Solito et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Jacobus gourlay ad instanciam prepositi recipitur in liberum burgensem
et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento

Johannes Sadlar' iure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem
gilde prestito solito Juramento et Solut' v s' in alba bursa

Thomas leche recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento et solut' x s'

Andreas smitht Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et
fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa
Willelmus leche recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento

Willelmus fingask ad instanciam domini Johannis Strachin recipitur
in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento

Gilbertus Wellis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
Solito Juramento

Andreas body causa matrimonij comprehendi inter ipsum et Elizibeth'
filiam Johannis Sthevinsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
Solito Juramento et si deficerit in contractu matrimonij soluet decim marcas
pro sua libertate

georgius talyour' recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento quia sponsauit filiam burgensis

Andreas Stewinsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
Solito Juramento et solut' xxtj s'

Patricius Dons' ad instanciam domini Andree chamer pro suis laboribus
recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento

Willelmus rolland ad pro laboribus philippi Dunbrek recipitur in
liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento
Patricius simsone recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa
Johannes red recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento et solut' v s' in alba bursa

Alexander mathesone Jure paternitatis recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde Solut'
v s' in alba bursa prestito Solito Juramento
Willelmus Wricht Junior gracia consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento
Willelmus Spruty gracia consilij recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento

Donaldus patyrsone' recipitur in liberum burgensem prestito Solito Juramento
et Solut'

accedensThis is a continuation of the entry on page 484 (ARO-7-0484-05). nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Johanne Duncansone Alexandro Crage et Philippo Dunbrek seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram thomas Waus et protestatus fuit pro
vno annuo Redditu vj s' octo d' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in vico viridi inter terram thome gledstane
versus occidens et communionem viam regiam versus oriens et terram ipsius
thome Waus ex australi et terram Agnetis gilespy ex boreali
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo
die huius processus tho testibus thoma glenmaluyn Willelmo cuminge
et thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Andreas murray Junior et protesta
tus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu sex s' et viij d' sibi annuatim debit' de
quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram Capellanj altaris Sancti Stephani ex australi
ex vna et terram Andree branche ex boriali partibus ab altera
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus georgio brovne Willelmo Scharp et thoma Jameson'
seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram thomas prat procurator in hac parte Dauid
prat et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu decim s' sibi annuatim debit'
de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram capellanj et altaris Sancti Stephani ex australi et terram Andree
branche ex boreali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam
primo die huius processus Testibus georgio brovne Willelmo scharp et thoma
Jamesone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus coupar et
protestatus fuit in forma iuris pro vno annuo Redditu
xiij s' et quatuor' d' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem inter
communiones vias regias versus oriens' et occidens et le calsay
exeuntem inter terram ipsius Willelmi et terram Richardi hile versus
austrum Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in
curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus thoma glen
maluyn Willelmo cuminge et thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes
penny prior fratrum predicatorum dicti burgi nomine procuratorio eiusdem
domus quod protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu vj s' et
octo d' sibi et dicto loco annuatim debito de vna terra vasta Ja
cente in vico superiore ecclesie inter terram thome prat ex orientali
et terram thome mar' ex australi ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in
sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus
Testibus Andrea tulibo Willelmo bynny et philippo Dunbrek seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Willelmus Crukschank
capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Duthaici infra ecclesiam beati nicholaij
de Abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in forma iuris pro vno annuo
Redditu quinque s' sibi et dicto altari annuatim debit' de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in vico superiore ecclesie inter terram thome prat
ex orientali et terram thome mar' ex australi Ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die
huius processus Testibus Andrea tulibo Willelmo bynny et philippo
Dunbrek seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram frater Johannes penny prior domus
fratrum predicatorum de Abirdene et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Red
ditu sex s' sibi et dicte domui ac conuentui eiusdem annuatim
debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex orientali parte
eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Richardi Kintor ex australi
et terram quondam thome Crovdane ex boreali Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam die
huius processus Testibus Andrea tulibo Willelmo bynne et phi
lippo Dunbrek seriando

Eodem die perlectus tribus processibus per dominum Johannem
blak procuratorem magistri Willelmum strachin capellanum altaris Sancti Johannis
baptiste infra ecclesiam beati nicholaij de Abirdene situati de et super
recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis Cuiusdam terre vaste
Jacentis infra dictum burgum in vico Nauium ex orientali parte
eiusdem vici inter terram gilberti riburne ex australi et terram
Jacobi Kintor ex boreali et orientali in defectu Solucionis vnius annuj
Redditus octodecim solidorum sibi capellano et dicto altari a longo
tempore debit' et non solut' vnde Willelmus blinsele prelocutor
dicti domini Johannis peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis
iuris et iusticie complementum Tunc curia mature
auisiata decreuit quod prefatus capellanus proprietatem et
possessionem dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis
annuj redditus antedicti Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone
Judicatoris Curie pro Judicio dato fuit Teste curia
Similiter quibus Idem capellanus peciit Instrumentum presentibus Alexandro menyeis
Andrea murray seniore thoma mar' Alexandro mar' matheo
branche patricio Rede Richardo Waus domino Willelmo mureson'
philippo Dunbrek et Andrea nachty seriandis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xviij xx die mensis Januarij Anno quo supra

Eodem die mariota quhit fecit constituit creauit et nominavit
Johannem Sanclar et thomam quhit coniunctim et divisim suos
legittimos procuratores ad petendum et recipiendum a thoma Wodman totas
firmas sibi debit' pro terra sua et de receptis acquitand' de terminis
elapsis ad agendum prosequendum et defendendum promitten'
de Rato et grato

The samyn day the belman passit throw the haile tone
and warnit and chargit ale ande Sindrie nichtbouris and burges
of the tone to cum to the tolbutht to cheis' certane taxtouris
tile extent the Some of xx li' grantit to Augmentacion
of our Souerane lordis mariage And' xxxtj li' to the commissaris
passand' for the gude of merchandice to the duk of burgunye
to the distruction of the letter of marque And' thareftir Androw
murray eldar William futhes gilbert menyeis thomas mar'
Alexander gray and James Craik was chosin and Suorne the gret bodely
aithe tile extent the said' Some amang the nichbouris
of the tone eftir thar' aithis ande conscience Induellaris
and distringeabile quhar it may be gottin to giddir with fiwe
to the commissaris expens' that passit to Edinburghe' to common
with the commissaris of vthir burrowis for the gude of merchandice

The said' day Androu litstar was conuikit be ane assis' William blinsel
forspekar for the trubulance of philp of Dunbrek and to amend' as
law wile and forber' in tym to Cum

the saide day Androw litstar conuikit be the said' assis' for the strubulance
of Wille rolland' And' Dauid Steuarte Come Souerte to entir
the saide Androu one friday that next Cumis befor the aldirman and balyeis
for the Amendis to be maid' to the said personis

Eodem die Willelmus verty conuictus per assisam pro perturbio thome Soutar Et
eciam pro perturbio Willelmi gray quibus emendabit ut iura volunt
et dabit dimidium libre cere ad lumen Sancti Sanguinis et non
vtetur Cultello longo nec breuj pro anno nisi pro cibariis
tantum pro satisfactione et emenda per assisam ex consensu preposito et
hoc ex ore Willelmj blinsele prelocutoris assise

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvij die Janu
arij anno quo supra

The said' day Androu Culane eldar lauchfully callit and nocht
to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit one him be androu murray
eldar for the wranguis' haldin fra him of viij markis et cetera
tharfor the balyeis chargit Androw nachty seriand pas' to the said'
androwis hous' and tak ane Streys' and latt it to borghe'
agane gif it be askit And' warne him to comper this day
xv dais to ansuer' to the said' borghe' as the thrid parte
day of proces'

add.foreign: penes diliberacionem cedularum de taxta et indittaminis

div.p:
The saide day the aldirman causit cavellis be askit castin
one the common' kist of the iiij taxt billis and byllis of dittay
be the balyeis and Ilkan of thame resavit thar' billis excepite
Androw Culane eldar quhilkis was nocht at hayme tharfor the
Aldirman'Aldirman' overwrites 'Androw'. causit the commone clerk to putt his billis in the
commone kist in kepin to his hayme cumyne

the saide day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis
to gilbert riburne to ansuer' to the borghe strekit one
him be Jonhne of chamer for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of x s' for j barrel of malt as day of peremptour

the saide day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis
to Dauid Spens to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit one
him be Jonhne Steuarte for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of ane kipe of his and discernit the copy of the said' borghe'
to the saide Dauid one his expens'

the saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Johne
of tulibo to ansuer to the borghe' strekit one him be Jonhne
Sanclar for the wranguis' haldin fra him of viij
markis and distrenit the copy of the said' borghe' to the
saide Jonhne one his expens'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo octauo die Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirmane balyeis consale and communite
warnit be the handbell throw the haile tone gathtreit and
Circualy Inquerit be philp Dunbrek officiar' gravntit ande
oppinly Schew that thai wald' ayfaldly defende thar'
landis and heretage of the Stokat batht with thar personis
and gudis at ale thar possibilite quhilkis is purchest be Androw
Wod' as thai ar' Informit
